tool_description: Check email addresses in real-time to verify their existence and validity. This ensures that a mailbox exists and is active, helping to maintain the integrity of your user database.
name: Email Validator
title: Email Validator

api_list.name: Validate with Rules
api_list.description: Your digital rulebook for email validation. This endpoint allows you to customize how you validate email addresses by setting blacklists, whitelists, and whether to allow free email providers. Simply provide the email query parameter to validate and the rules in the request body, and watch as it works to reflect your preferences in real-time. It's like having a personal, programmable email bouncer at your disposal.
